abstract: Interceptions have not been nearly as great an issue for the Giants this season as they were in 2010, but if ever there was a game for a relapse, this would be it.
snippet: Interceptions have not been nearly as great an issue for the Giants this season as they were in 2010, but if ever there was a game for a relapse, this would be it.
lead_paragraph: Bills (4-1) at Giants (3-2), 1 p.m. Eastern, CBS

headline.main: Bills at Giants: Matchup to Watch
